title: Miguel Ángel Biaggio
text:
Miguel Ángel Olivares Biaggio (born September 3, 1976 in <a href="San%20Luis%20Potos%C3%AD%2C%20San%20Luis%20Potos%C3%AD">San Luis Potosí</a>, <a href="San%20Luis%20Potos%C3%AD">San Luis Potosí</a>), also known as Miguel Angel Biagio, Mike Biagio, Mike Biaggio, is a Mexican <a href="actor">actor</a>.
Biaggio made his acting debut in the 1996 <a href="telenovela">telenovela</a> "<a href="El%20vuelo%20del%20%C3%A1guila">El vuelo del águila</a>" and since then, has appeared in various other telenovelas. Among those, <a href="El%20juego%20de%20la%20vida">El juego de la vida</a>, "<a href="Corazones%20al%20l%C3%ADmite">Corazones al límite</a>, "<a href="La%20Madrastra%20%282005%20telenovela%29">La Madrastra</a>, <a href="Contra%20viento%20y%20marea%20%28Mexican%20TV%20series%29">Contra viento y marea</a>, <a href="Rebelde%20%28Mexican%20telenovela%29">Rebelde</a>, <a href="Muchachitas%20como%20tu">Muchachitas como tu</a>, <a href="Querida%20Enemiga">Querida Enemiga</a>, <a href="Un%20gancho%20al%20corazon">Un gancho al corazon</a>, <a href="Zacatillo%2C%20un%20lugar%20en%20tu%20corazon">Zacatillo, un lugar en tu corazon</a> and <a href="Amorcito%20Corazon">Amorcito Corazon</a> and <a href="Qu%C3%A9%20bonito%20amor%20%28telenovela%29">Qué bonito amor</a>. Biaggio was also a member of the Mexican band <a href="Mercurio%20%28band%29">Mercurio</a>.
